overview: Gregory Gilman is the CEO and co-founder of RxVantage. Prior to founding RxVantage, Greg was a professor of law and the director of the Center for Entrepreneurship and Technology Law at Pepperdine University School of Law, where he taught intellectual property. Prior to joining the faculty, Greg practiced at Gilman/McFadden LLP in Los Angeles, CA, where he was head of the Entertainment, Intellectual Property, and Business Transactions practices, focusing his practice on music and technology law and representing numerous early stage businesses, including Userplane (now an AOL company), as well as independent record labels, media and production companies, and recording artists. He has been involved with startup companies in nearly every capacity -from attorney to principal to consultant - over the past decade. He has also served on the board of directors of several startup companies and non-profit organizations.
